metadata.title: CVE-2016-3164 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
Drupal 6.x before 6.38, 7.x before 7.43, and 8.x before 8.0.4 might allowremote attackers to conduct open redirect attacks by leveraging (1) customcode or (2) a form shown on a 404 error page, related to path manipulation.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-3164` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

drupal7 - 7.43-1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: drupal7 package in esm-apps/xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '7.43-1').
